description: Single storey rear extension, rear patio windows, Conversion of side garage to habitable space, replacement of front crittall casement windows and doors, new boundary treatment and conversion of the main roof to habitable use to provide additional bedroom with en-suite installation of four rooflights to the side and rear elevations.
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): P001 (site plan and location plan), P002 (proposed block plan), P010 (ground floor plan existing), P011 (first floor plan existing), P012 (roof plan existing), P020 (front elevation existing), P021 (rear elevation existing), P022 (side elevation existing), P023 (side elevation existing), P100 Rev B (ground floor plan proposed), P101 Rev B (first floor plan proposed), P102 Rev B (second floor plan proposed), P103 Rev B (roof plan proposed), P110 Rev A (front garden wall proposed), P200 Rev A (front elevation proposed), P201 Rev B (rear elevation proposed), P202 Rev C (side elevation proposed), P203 Rev C (side elevation proposed), P220 Rev A (Front elevation proposed materials details), P221 Rev B (Rear elevation proposed materials details), P222 Rev A (Rear patio windows section proposed materials and details), Design and Access Statement prepared by Pu architect dated 26 August 2024.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| The hereby approved ^IN; rooflights to the roof slope of the hereby development shall be Conservation style rooflights and lie flush with the roof and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason:  To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the conservation area in accordance with policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
